info.description: Create, modify, delete, search and evaluate criteria.
info.title: Criterion

Any.description:
`Any` contains an arbitrary serialized message along with a
URL that describes the type of the serialized message

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized message.

enumsCriterionType.description:
- CRITERION_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified criteria type
 - CRITERION_TYPE_WATCHLIST: Watchlist criteria type
 - CRITERION_TYPE_RESEARCH_NOTE: Research note criteria type
 - CRITERION_TYPE_INVESTMENT_OPINION: Investment opinion value criteria type
 - CRITERION_TYPE_CREDIT_APPROVAL: Credit approval criteria type
 - CRITERION_TYPE_ESG: ESG criteria type
 - CRITERION_TYPE_INVESTMENT_OPINION_UPDATE: Investment opinion update criteria type
enumsCriterionType.title: Criteria Types

enumsNotificationFrequency.description:
- NOTIFICATION_FREQUENCY_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified
 - NOTIFICATION_FREQUENCY_YEARLY: Yearly
 - NOTIFICATION_FREQUENCY_QUARTERLY: Quarterly
 - NOTIFICATION_FREQUENCY_MONTHLY: Monthly
 - NOTIFICATION_FREQUENCY_WEEKLY: Weekly
 - NOTIFICATION_FREQUENCY_DAILY: Daily
 - NOTIFICATION_FREQUENCY_HOURLY: Hourly
 - NOTIFICATION_FREQUENCY_IMMEDIATELY: Immediately
enumsNotificationFrequency.title: The notification frequency

enumsResearchNotificationType.description:
- RESEARCH_NOTIFICATION_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified
 - RESEARCH_NOTIFICATION_TYPE_EMAIL: Email
(-- api-linter: aladdin::9301::event-type-values=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because type specified isnt included in expected event type wordlist --)
enumsResearchNotificationType.title: Notification types for alert

typesDataValue.title: A data value of one of the following type

listIds.description: Criteria of list id to delete.

entityIds.description: Criteria of entity ids to delete.

entityId.title: entity id: cusip or issuer id

criteria.title:
criteria query
(-- api-linter: core::0144::message-field-plural=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: criteria should be a single string because criteria can be connected with AND/OR --)

recipients.title: list of recipients where alerts will be sent. A recipient can be an email address, mobile number, another app, etc

alertFrequency.title: how often will the criteria be evaluated for given alert_frequency_unit below ex: Weekly, Quarterly, Yearly

rolling.title: true if rolling alerts since last triggered; false if absolute - always compare to start date

parameters.title:
parameters that only apply to a certain type of criteria
maps from parameter name to value

entityIds.description: entity ids: cusips, issuer ids, etc.

criteria.title:
a criteria string to evaluate
e.g. "price > 55", or a more complicated one "((price > 55 OR oas = 75) AND market_cap < 1mm) OR msci_social_score > 5.0"
(-- api-linter: core::0144::message-field-plural=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: criteria have to be a single string because they will be connected by AND/ORs --)

evaluations.description: result mapping, from entity ids to results (true/false).

v1FilterCriteriaByUserRequest.title:
The request message for CriterionAPI.FilterCriteriaByUser.
(-- api-linter: aladdin::9016::request-message-query=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because owner id as the query parameter is more consistent with our context and use case --)

pageSize.title: The maximum value is 1000. If unspecified, the default value is 100

criteria.description: The entities that match the specified CriteriaRequest.

v1RunCriteriaRequest.title:
The request message for CriterionAPI.RunCriteria
All the criteria will be evaluated if all fields are omitted

evaluations.description: result mapping, from criterion ids to results (true/false).

v1SearchCriteriaRequest.title:
The request message for CriterionAPI.SearchCriteria.
(-- api-linter: core::0158::request-page-token-field=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because irrelevant in this context --)

filterCriteria.description:
Multiple criteria can also be joined by AND and OR logic operator
Other supported logic operator includes ! means not equal, IN for a list of value terms, etc.
e.g. criterion.owner:"user" AND (criterion.entity_id.asset_id:"123456789" OR criterion.entity_id.issuer:"*ABC*") , etc.
(-- api-linter: core::0132::request-unknown-fields=disabled
aip.dev/not-precedent: We really need this field because it is already implemented in prod --)
filterCriteria.title:
Specifies the filter criteria, please refer to Criterion message for valid criteria target field name
The supported syntax (for now): 
criterion.[target field]:[term] Eg: criterion.owner:"user"
[term] Eg: Technology (Matches anything containing Technology anywhere)

orderBy.description: Sorts the response with ascending or descending order based on specific field. Default as asc.

pageSize.description:
The maximum number of research notes to return. The service may
return fewer than this value. If unspecified, at most 10
note will be returned.

pageNumber.description:
When paginating, all other parameters provided to
'SearchCriteria' must match the call that provided the page
number.
pageNumber.title: A page number

criteria.description: The entities that match the specified CriterionRequest.

nextPageToken.description:
A token, which can be sent as 'page_token' to retrieve the next page.
If this field is omitted, there are no subsequent pages.

OAuth2AccessCode.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the access code flow.

scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.

OAuth2ClientCredentials.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the client credentials flow.

scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.
